SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Account
Represents an account for a user with a unique staff ID and password.
Admin
Represents an administrator with specific management privileges.
BankCard
Represents a bank card payment method.
Branch
Represents a branch of the fast food ordering and management system.
BranchManager
Represents a manager of a branch with capabilities to manage orders, menus, and staff within the branch.
Customer
Represents a customer who can browse menus, add items to cart, place orders, track orders, and collect orders.
DatabaseExporter
Class responsible for exporting database data to CSV format.
DatabaseInitializer
Class responsible for initializing database data from CSV files.
Employee
Abstract class representing a generic employee with a name, staff ID, user type, gender, and age.
IAdminManagement
Interface defining administrative management capabilities.
ICustomerOrderProcess
This interface defines methods for processing orders by a customer.
IMenuManagement
Interface defining menu management capabilities for branches.
InMemoryDatabase
Represents an in-memory database storing accounts, branches, and employees.
IOrderProcess
Interface for processing and managing orders within a branch.
IStaffManagement
Interface for managing and displaying a list of staff members.
Menu
This class represents a menu for a specific branch.
MenuDisplay
This class is responsible for displaying the menu items in a formatted manner.
MenuEditor
This class is responsible for editing menu items, including adding new items, deleting existing items, and updating item names and prices.
MenuItem
This class represents a single item in the menu, containing all relevant details such as item name, price, ID, category, associated branch, and customizations.
Order
Represents an order placed by a customer.
Order.orderStatusFlags
Enum representing the status of the order.
OrderList
Manages a collection of orders within a branch, providing functionality to add, remove, and retrieve orders using unique order IDs.
Payment
Abstract class representing a payment method.
PayNow
Represents a PayNow payment method.
PayPal
Represents a PayPal payment method.
ReceiptGenerator
Provides functionality to generate a detailed receipt for an order.
SerializationUtil
A utility class for serializing and deserializing objects.
Staff
This class represents a staff member, which is a specific type of employee with a branch association.
UserType
Enumeration defining different types of users within the system.
